description: This table contains data associated with task (LTK) records.

columns.name: TASK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record.

columns.name: DESC_FOR_PAT_OVRIDE
columns.description: A descriptive name for instances of this task that is written specifically for a given patient.

columns.name: NAME_FOR_PAT_OVRIDE
columns.description: A descriptive name for instances of this task at LTK level that is written specifically for patients.

columns.name: START_OFFSET_DAYS
columns.description: Number of days to offset the start date from the task assignment or the anchor event date.

columns.name: START_OFFSET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of start date offset (e.g., before/after).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Before


After

columns.name: SOURCE_LTT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the task template (LTT) was assigned which resulted in tasks (LTK) being created.

columns.name: CALCULATED_RESUME_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: When resuming a paused task, this will be its start instant if no start date is specified.

columns.name: FLO_THRESHOLD_VALUE
columns.description: Threshold value for flowsheet based task completion.

columns.name: TSK_DISCONTINUE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Describe the reason of the discontinued patient-assigned task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Discontinued by Provider


Finished


Discontinued through BPA


Discontinued by Patient


Discontinued by Chart Correction

columns.name: ENSURE_DELIVERY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Determines whether task will be delivered if scheduled start date has passed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Always


Ignore Past Instances


Never

columns.name: EFQ_OVRIDE_CYL_LEN
columns.description: If there is a frequency override specified, this item will contain the length of a relative specified type cycle. For all other specified types this value will be ignored (and should be empty).

columns.name: EFQ_OVRIDE_DAY_TYP
columns.description: Specifies what the numeric values in the frequency override days columns represent. If it is 1 then the listed days are relative days. If it is 2 then the listed days are weekdays. Any other value has no meaning.

columns.name: DURATION
columns.description: Number of days this recurring task should go on for relative to the configured start date.

columns.name: TASK_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note (HNO) ID that is attached to the task (LTK) record.

columns.name: DECISION_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: Stores the linked decision, if one exists, for this task

columns.name: REQ_DOC_NOT_ATTRIBUTED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The did not attribute reason category ID for the required documentation task. This indicates the reason that the task was not attributed to any users.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Could Not Find Any Appropriate Users


Already Completed Before Evaluation

columns.name: USED_FOR_OUTREACH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a checklist task is used for outreach or not. 'Y' indicates that the checklist task is used for outreach. 'N' or NULL indicates that the checklist task is not used for outreach.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PAT_ASGN_TASK_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Admission contact serial number for the admission linked to this task.

columns.name: SC_SUPPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the support & service type that triggered the generation of this task


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SC_SUPPORT_TYPE_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the support & service type that triggered the generation of this task

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral that this target is tracking.

columns.name: USED_FOR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number which identifies the purpose for which the task is used.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Target


Outpatient Care Plan


Outreach


Case Review


Checklist


Medication Therapy Problem

columns.name: CREATE_INST_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the task was created, in local time. This item is the local equivalent of the CREATION_UTC_DTTM column, which is in UTC.

columns.name: LINKED_PAT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the patient linked directly or indirectly to the task record. This differs from column PAT_ID in table IP_WORKLIST in that this column also contains patients linked indirectly to a task, through a patient CSN (I LTK 215) or an episode (HSB) (I LTK 53100 or I LTK 81110). To find only patients linked directly to a task, use column PAT_ID in table IP_WORKLIST.
